data.title: St. James Church
data.meta_description: We are a Christian community of the Episcopal tradition, growing in Jesus Christ. We strive to hold in our hearts and actions the spiritual and physical welfare of others in Christ’s name. Serving the Painesville Ohio and surrounding areas.
data.text:
200th Anniversary – Celebrate and Serve

Our yearlong Bicentennial Calibration is in full swing!

August is upon us and the Bicentennial fun at St. James continues! Up-coming events include:

On Sunday, August 25th, we will be hosting the Snow Belt Brass Quintet – formally The Madison Brass – at 3PM. There will be an ice cream social to follow. Please see our calendar for details.

On Tuesday, August 27th we have a Celebration of New Ministry for our Rector, Rev. Rachel Harrison. The service will be in the main sanctuary at 7PM and the Rt. Rev. Anne B. Jolly, Bishop of the Diocese of Ohio, will be joining us.

We will have more exciting events in September and October and culminating with a Grand Finale celebration in November! You won’t want to miss out!
